name: bulmabuildingblocks
description: Bulma Building Blocks allows you to generate websites using snippets based on the Bulma CSS Frameworks.
author: Joseph Anson <me@josephanson.com>

scripts.build:scss: node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-package-importer/dist/cli.js --output-style expanded ./src/with-variables.scss | node build/banner.js > dist/bulmabuildingblocks.css && cleancss -o dist/bulmabuildingblocks.min.css dist/bulmabuildingblocks.css && git add dist/bulmabuildingblocks.css && git add dist/bulmabuildingblocks.min.css
scripts.release:major: npm run build:scss && changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "chore: update changelog" && npm version major
scripts.release:minor: npm run build:scss && changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "chore: update changelog" && npm version minor
scripts.release:patch: npm run build:scss && changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "chore: update changelog" && npm version patch
